title: Track Awesome Pleb Projects Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Pleb Projects (quilloughbee/awesome-pleb-projects) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A List of Awesome Bitcoin (Pleb) Projects

items.title: Awesome Pleb Projects Updates on Feb 20 - Feb 26, 2023

### Content Creation

items.title: Awesome Pleb Projects Updates on Oct 10 - Oct 16, 2022
items.summary: 16 awesome projects updated on Oct 10 - Oct 16, 2022
items.content_text:
### Chain

*   [python-bitcoinlib (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/petertodd/python-bitcoinlib) - This Python3 library provides an easy interface to the bitcoin data structures and protocol

### Nodes

*   [Raspiblitz (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/rootzoll/raspiblitz) - Build your own Lightning & Bitcoin Fullnode on a RaspberryPi with a nice Display

### Learning Material

*   [bitcoin-tutorials (⭐283)](https://github.com/openoms/bitcoin-tutorials)

### Lightning / Tools

*   [Alby (⭐552)](https://github.com/getAlby/lightning-browser-extension) - A browser extension to bring the Bitcoin Lightning Network to the browser
*   [lnproxy (⭐3)](https://github.com/lnproxy/lnproxy) - lnproxy takes a bolt 11 invoice and generates a “wrapped” invoice that can be settled if and only if the original invoice is settled
*   [Tallycoin Connect (⭐31)](https://github.com/djbooth007/tallycoin_connect) - Install Tallycoin Connect on a bitcoin node to allow for the retrieval of lightning invoices via Tallycoin. LND required.
*   [TARO (⭐489)](https://github.com/lightninglabs/taro) - Taro Daemon tarod implements the Taro protocol for issuing assets on the Bitcoin blockchain
*   [storage4sats](https://github.com/rottingcleaner/storage4sats) - Upload a file, pay with sats. No account, no ads.

### Lightning / Hardware

*   [LN-TinyPOS (⭐8)](https://github.com/ccadic/LN-TinyPOS) - Small Lightning Network Tiny POS System By @sulfuroid

### Lightning / Wallets

*   [BlueWallet (⭐3k)](https://github.com/BlueWallet/BlueWallet) - Thin Bitcoin Wallet. Built with React Native and Electrum.
*   [Lightning Address (⭐398)](https://github.com/andrerfneves/lightning-address) - The Lightning Address is an Internet Identifier that allows anyone to send you Bitcoin over the Lightning Network
*   [Zeus (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/ZeusLN/zeus) - Zeus is a mobile Bitcoin/Lightning node manager and wallet application for LND, Core Lightning, and Eclair

### Companies & Organizations / Wallets

*   [Alby](https://github.com/getAlby)
*   [European Bitcoiners](https://github.com/European-Bitcoiners)
*   [Lightning Labs](https://github.com/lightninglabs)
*   [lnbits](https://github.com/lnbits)
items.content_html:
Chain

  • python-bitcoinlib (⭐1.9k) - This Python3 library provides an easy interface to the bitcoin data structures and protocol

Nodes

  • Raspiblitz (⭐2.5k) - Build your own Lightning & Bitcoin Fullnode on a RaspberryPi with a nice Display

Learning Material

  • bitcoin-tutorials (⭐283)

Lightning / Tools

  • Alby (⭐552) - A browser extension to bring the Bitcoin Lightning Network to the browser
  • lnproxy (⭐3) - lnproxy takes a bolt 11 invoice and generates a “wrapped” invoice that can be settled if and only if the original invoice is settled
  • Tallycoin Connect (⭐31) - Install Tallycoin Connect on a bitcoin node to allow for the retrieval of lightning invoices via Tallycoin. LND required.
  • TARO (⭐489) - Taro Daemon tarod implements the Taro protocol for issuing assets on the Bitcoin blockchain
  • storage4sats - Upload a file, pay with sats. No account, no ads.

Lightning / Hardware

  • LN-TinyPOS (⭐8) - Small Lightning Network Tiny POS System By @sulfuroid

Lightning / Wallets

  • BlueWallet (⭐3k) - Thin Bitcoin Wallet. Built with React Native and Electrum.
  • Lightning Address (⭐398) - The Lightning Address is an Internet Identifier that allows anyone to send you Bitcoin over the Lightning Network
  • Zeus (⭐1.1k) - Zeus is a mobile Bitcoin/Lightning node manager and wallet application for LND, Core Lightning, and Eclair

Companies & Organizations / Wallets

  • Alby
  • European Bitcoiners
  • Lightning Labs
  • lnbits

items.title: Awesome Pleb Projects Updates on Oct 03 - Oct 09, 2022
items.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Oct 03 - Oct 09, 2022
items.content_text:
### 3D Printing

*   [HODLITEMS](https://hodlitems.com/) - hodlitems are bitcoin enthusiasts who want to share their passion for 3D printing with the world

### Displays, LED, Tickers

*   [BitcoinPriceLED (⭐9)](https://github.com/Egge7/BitcoinPriceLED) - LED-lamp that represents the current Bitcoin price trend
*   [BTC E-ink Ticker (⭐52)](https://github.com/btc-ticker/btc-ticker) - bitcoin-ticker is a E-ink ticker that shows usefull information about bitcoin
*   [Bitcoin Kindle Display](https://d11n.net/kindle-status-display.html) - Bitcoin Status on an old Kindle

### Nodes

*   [Citadel (⭐138)](https://github.com/runcitadel/citadel) - allows you to run your own Bitcoin Lightning node and personal server

### Lightning / Hardware

*   [bitcoinSwitch (⭐78)](https://github.com/lnbits/bitcoinSwitch) - turn things on with Bitcoin
*   [LNPoS (⭐75)](https://github.com/lnbits/LNPoS) - Free and open-source bitcoin point-of-sale

### Telegram Bots / Wallets

*   [Einundzwanzig Bot (⭐5)](https://github.com/Einundzwanzig-Podcast/einundzwanzigbot) - Einundzwanzig Community Bot

### Podcasts / Community

*   [Einundzwanzig, der Bitcoin Podcast](https://einundzwanzig.space/) - Toximalistisches Infotainment für bullishe Bitcoiner
*   [Pleb's Taverne](https://anchor.fm/plebs-taverne) - Der Bitcoin Stammtisch für toxische Bitcoin Plebs und die, die es noch werden

### Podcasts / Creators

*   [Was Bitcoin bringt](https://github.com/quillie/awesome-pleb-projects/blob/main/README.md/wasbitcoinbringt.com/) - Der Bitcoin-Podcast mit Niko Jilch
